p: Equine cases related to WNV are reported through the Animal Disease Notification System (ADNS) of the European Commission. During the transmission season of 2017, three cases were reported which originated from Hungary [ 1]. In contrast to the previous year, in 2018, 91 equine cases were detected by serologic survey and virus neutralization tests. As a result, the number of cases implies an approximately 30-fold increase in WNV cases among equines.
